did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle: Papers of Woodrow Wilson 1884-1924

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Woodrow Wilson, [Title], [Date], [Accession number]. Special

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired by gift and purchase.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Twenty-Eighth President, 1913-1921. Born: December 28, 1856 in Staunton, Virginia. Died: February 3, 1924 in Washington D.C. Married to Ellen Louise Axson Wilson and to Edith Bolling Galt Wilson.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of letters by Wilson, chiefly to various friends and politicians. The collection also includes photographs of Wilson as Governor of New Jersey and President of the United States.

scopecontent.p: Front row: Governor W.C. Sproul, Pennsylvania; Attorney General A. Mitchell Palmer; President Wilson; Governor F.D. Gardner, Missouri. Others, left to right: Brigadier General Barry of Pennsylvania; Governor C.F. Milliken, Maine; Governor R.W. Cooper, South Carolina; Governor Thomas E. Campbell, Arizona; Attorney General John T. Gose, Missouri; Governor A.A. Burnquist, Minnesota; Secretary of Governors Conference, M.E. Riley; Secretary to Governor Sproul, Harry S. McDevitt; Lieutenant Governor McDowell, Montana. Forms part of the G.E. Thompson Woodrow Wilson Photograph Collection. Mounted on linen and hinged. 38. (#38-192)
